bill.title: Volumetric Ethanol Excise Tax Credit Repeal Act
bill.summary: 3/14/2011--Introduced. Volumetric Ethanol Excise Tax Credit Repeal Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the immediate repeal (the current expiration date is December 31, 2011) of the income and excise tax credits for alchol fuel mixtures (ethanol).
